mapper.sql: logid, userid, uri, ip, `method`, start_time, spend_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_log
logid,
userid,
uri,
ip,
`method`,
start_time,
spend_time,
create_time,
update_time,
#{logid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{spendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update sys_log
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
uri = #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
spend_time = #{spendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where logid = #{logid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_log set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uri = #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, spend_time = #{spendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where logid = #{logid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select log.logid, log.userid, log.uri, log.ip, log.`method`, log.start_time as startTime, log.spend_time as spendTime, log.create_time as createTime, log.update_time as updateTime, suser.user_name as userName from sys_log log left join sys_user suser on log.userid = suser.user_id
and suser.user_name like concat(#{userName}, '%')
